title: Inba Ragangal Lyrics Hello Brother
stanzas:
Inba raagangal nenjukulle
pongukindra ponvelai.
undhan gaanangal kadhalikka
sollukindra suba velai.

kannodu adikkudhu melam
nenjodu thagathimi thaalam
nammodu kuraiyattum thooram
kondaadu vaaliba vaaram.

Inba raagangal nenjukulle
pongukindra ponvelai.
undhan gaanangal kadhalikka
sollukindra suba velai.

solaiyil poonguyil
paadiya Â paadalil
swarangalum neethaane
pathangalum naanthaane.

vaalibam meettiya
kadhalin veenaiyil
shruthi shruthi neethaane
layam layam naanthane.

edhirkaalam kangalil
naankandu konden
adhu eppadi unnile
naan ennai kanden

Inba raagangal nenjukulle
pongukindra ponvelai.
undhan gaanangal kadhalikka
sollukindra suba velai.

Kaamanun dheviyum
kadhalil kaangira
adhe adhe kalai vendum
idhe idhe sugam vendum.

vayasukku rusi tharum
velaiyil maangani
agam kaninthadhu enna
sugam vilaindhathu enna

penmai konda kanmani
unnai kandu kondaal.
iru kannil vennilaa
aval kondu vandhaal.

mannavaa panimaarave
palli ingae..
pasum paal pazham
thevai ingae.

Inba raagangal nenjukulle
pongukindra ponvelai.
undhan gaanangal kadhalikka
sollukindra suba velai.

kannodu adikkudhu melam
nenjodu thagathimi thaalam
nammodu kuraiyattum thooram
kondaadu vaaliba vaaram.

Inba raagangal nenjukulle
pongukindra ponvelai.
undhan gaanangal kadhalikka
sollukindra suba velai.
